page.title: 13HOPES AND FEARS
page.content: Of the people surveyed the strongest point made was a profound hope that their environment will always stay the same. Whilst amenities are totally lacking in the area, peace tranquility and a steady pace of life are enjoyed and appreciated by all. The only thing they would change is to have a Bus service of some kind in the area. A comment often made was "Our land is our heritage", something they consider to be vitally important. The main hope of all is that the unemployed, in particular the younger generation will one day have the opportunity to gain full employment and a decent standard of living.
